full_summary:
**Bid Invitation for Safety and Rescue Equipment**
====================================================================

** Invitation Number:** PW-22-01012768

** Solicitation Number:** W8482-230492/A

**Publication Date:** November 7, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** December 19, 2022, 02:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)

The Department of National Defence is inviting qualified vendors to submit a bid for the procurement of Safety and Rescue Equipment. The bid is for the purchase of the following items:

* 1,000 Life Preservers, Yoke, and Units (NCAGE: 3AF10) to be delivered to Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Esquimalt (item #1) and CFB Halifax (item #2)
* 170 Safety and Rescue Harnesses, Swimmer's Units (NCAGE: 3AF10) to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt (item #3) and 110 units to CFB Halifax (item #4)

**GSIN Classification:** N4220E, N4240

**Business Requirements:**

* Bid offerings must be submitted in Canadian dollars.
* Equivalent or substitute products must include the brand name, model, and/or Part Number and the NSN (National Stock Number) of the product being offered.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contracting Information:**

* Contracting Entity: Department of National Defence
* Contracting Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada
* Contact Person: Stephane Potvin, Procurement Officer
* Contact Email: [stephane.potvin2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:stephane.potvin2@forces.gc.ca)

**Additional Information:**

* Bidders are required to submit a bid using the documentation provided.
* The Department of National Defence reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

To obtain more information and access the bid documents, please visit the [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) portal.

[English Bid Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/07/4897dc393ebad14ab230683a3c0595e3/w8482-230492_rfp_en.pdf)

[French Bid Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/
